name: Organic Coconut 20% Rich Body Cream
description: A gently hydrating formula to soothe, nourish & instantly comfort the feeling of dryness. Enriched with a high concentration of pure Organic Coconut Oil - naturally cold pressed at source from the finest fresh coconuts hand-picked from the lush tropical gardens of Ceylon. Rich in natural vitamins & protective anti-oxidants to help deliver moisture & nourishment, while fortifying skin & protecting against dryness. Helps soften & smoothen skin, protecting against the elements & promoting even skin tone.

name: Organic Neem and Tea Tree Face Essentials Set
description: Organic skincare essentials designed to fulfill the advanced needs of your face care routine.

name: Organic True Turmeric Vitamin C Glow Renewing Treatment Serum
description: An organic serum designed to renew and refresh your skin with the power of natural ingredients.

name: Organic Lavender Body Lotion
description: A soothing organic body lotion with the calming scent of lavender.

name: Organic Aloe Vera Face Cleanser
description: An organic face cleanser enriched with the goodness of aloe vera.
